text: Learn some basic facts about China in this beginner’s Mandarin passage.中国很大，是世界第二大国家，面积为960万平方公里；从地图上看，中国像一只公鸡。China is in the southeast of Asia. It is the most populous country in the world.China is very large and is the second largest country in the world with an area of 9.6 million square kilometers. If you look at a map, you will see that china looks like a rooster!China has 5,000 years of history.
